name: Crate Loading Sim
description:
It is recommended you download and play the game for the best experience. The in-browser option is available those who can't download it, but be warned there are lots of sound issues.

Its is time for every one's favorite task, Loading Crates!

How good of a job can you do? Can you get the legendary S rank?

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to look around

This was made for the  Strange Secret and Deep Lore  Game Jam.

Who are you, and why are you loading crates?  Can you get S rank?
